_header: Of wonders that shall fall after our day
_description: A prophecy — ninety-two irregular rhyming lines

BodHat56.First Lines:
Of wonders þat shull fall after our dayWhen we be dede &
                    leid in clay…
BodHat56.Last Lines:
…This was profesie [ ] all youIn þe tyme of kyng
                    IohnAnd in þe [ ] it shall be[ ] be it still fallcoun[ ] it
                    may not fallen
